FuncDef:
The description command configures a description for a PVC.
The undo description command cancels the description of a PVC.
By default, no description is configured for a PVC.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a description for a PVC.
The value is a string of 1 to 242 case-sensitive characters, spaces supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure a description for a PVC, run the description command.
Prerequisites
A PVC has been configured using the pvc command.
